EmailTemplate.name: Direct-To June 2020.Aviation Newsletter June 2020
EmailTemplate.subject: Aviation Newsletter: June 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
You may have received May's newsletter yesterday, but we want to ensure you receive June's newsletter as well so you receive the most up-to-date information. Thank you! News for FMZ-2000 Operators Using Pre-FMS 6.1 Software
Beginning in January 2021, an end-of-life program will be initiated for software versions prior to FMS 6.1. The end-of-life actions will not interrupt Navigation Database subscription service; however, operators may experience price increases. We encourage all the FMZ-2000 operators to consider the FMS 6.1 upgrade which offers significant features and benefits over the previous versions, while we are committed to offer our support for a seamless upgrade process. Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/cockpit-systems-and-displays/fmz-2000-version-6-1-upgrade?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Update on the Honeywell GoDirect Trade Integration
GoDirect Trade Integration: We now have full integration with GoDirect Trade – Honeywell’s online marketplace for used Aerospace parts. Once logged into Aerospace.Honeywell.com, customers can access Honeywell’s extensive used serviceable material with real-time availability and pricing. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes/2020/godirect-trade-integration?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>.
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Aircraft on Ground (AOG): Our Aircraft on Ground order process has now been fully automated. Customers may now submit orders for Exchange Parts and/or Repair Services via the Online Ordering in support of an AOG. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes/2020/online-ordering-aog?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>.
Communications and Documentations: Now authorized service centers in Business and General Aviation can quickly search and locate documents like Aftermarket Program Information Letters (APILS), Special Pricing Notices (SPN) or other letters. They can be accessed from the service center tools <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/services-and-support/repair-services/bga-service-center?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> or directly here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/comm-and-docs?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>. Subscribe to receive email notifications when any of these documents are modified within My Account and select the Email and Notifications tab.
To catch up on latest improvements to MyAerospace, please refer to our Release Notes page here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>. Curious How Honeywell’s MSP Compares To Other Maintenance Service Plans?
Find out how we stack up against the competition with this free infographic.
Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/maintenance-service-plan-propulsion?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2020/06/top-five-faqs-customer-support-managers?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
Top 5 FAQs with your Customer Support Managers
Our team of customer support managers (CSMs) put together a list of the top 5 most frequently asked questions as well as the portal features every business and general aviation operator needs to know about. You can find all these features on the Aerospace.Honeywell.com website.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2020/06/top-five-faqs-customer-support-managers?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2020/05/onsite-with-diego-cifuentes?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
Onsite with Field Service Engineer: Diego CiFuentes
Diego joined Honeywell Customer Support 12 years ago from Avianca Airlines, bringing an understanding of what it’s like to walk in the customer’s shoes since his previous role was head of avionics for the airline. Read more about how he supports customers at Honeywell.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2020/05/onsite-with-diego-cifuentes?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/06/easy-avionics-part-4?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
EASy Avionics: Everything You Ever Wanted to Know About Vertical Navigation
Part 4 – Early and Late VNAV Descents By Ryan Milmoe This article explores VNAV descents that begin either before or after the FMS-calculated top-of-descent (TOD) point and what to expect from the automation in these situations.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/06/easy-avionics-part-4?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/06/sil-briefing?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
SIL Briefing AW139 Approaches With MAP Offset From Runway
By Rob Erlick Service Information Letter (SIL) D201704000013 describes a missed-approach condition in which a missed approach will sequence differently than the published missed approach course and will not guarantee obstacle clearance....
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/06/sil-briefing?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Laseref IV Retrofit Program
The Laseref II & III inertial reference systems are obsolete and Honeywell stopped supporting these products as of Jan 1, 2020. Consider upgrading to Laseref IV today.
Learn More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/navigation-and-radios/laseref-iv-inertial-reference-systems?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletters]]> Let's Connect!
Sign up to receive exclusive communications about offerings, events, news, surveys, special offers, and related topics via telephone, email, and other forms of electronic communication.
